Download "Star Wars Galactic Battlegrounds the Clone Campaigns by Lime" instead. I actually works.

A little install tutorial.

First I used poweriso (though alcohol 120 and daemon also work) for the files. Then I installed both cd 1 and cd 2 (which can be found here). The first time I was able to play with the second cd mounted, but that didn't work.Luckily gamecopyworld.com had a crack. Just replace the battlegrounds.exe with gcw's version 1.1 exe.

http://m0001.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_sw_galactic_battlegrounds.shtml#Galactic%20Battlegrounds%20v1.1%20[ENGLISH]%20No-CD/Fixed%20EXE
Oh, this was on vista 64 bit.

No-one download this!
It doesn't work, first of all it doesn't even contain the setup file; and if you paste the setup file from the cd, there are still loads of files missing.
So I'm telling you don't download this!
